name: 2D Platformer Tutorial (lia4)
description:
This is my version of the 2D Platformer tutorial. 

The modifications I am planning to do for the final game are:

-Add 2 or 3 more complex levels

-Change difficulty of enemies as levels progress

-Change the formatting of the main menu screen

-Add text to show what level the player is on during gameplay

Created by Kelia Patterson
